#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
#include <memory.h>
using namespace std;

typedef long long int ll;

ll ar[100001],dp[201][100001];
int main() {

    ll u,n,a,b,i,j,limit;
    cin>>n>>u;
    limit = sqrt(n);
    memset(ar,0,sizeof(ar));
    memset(dp,0,sizeof(dp));
    while(u--){
        cin>>a>>b;
        if(a>=200){
            for(i=b;i<=n;i+=a)
                ar[i]++;
        }
        else
            dp[a][b]++;
    }
    for(i=1;i<=n;i++){
        for(j=1;j<200;j++){
            ar[i]+=dp[j][i];
            if(i+j<=n)
                dp[j][j+i]+=dp[j][i];
        }
        cout<<ar[i]<<" ";
    }
	return 0;
}
